div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 2332 Talamanca, Ibiza, before 1906 (654) Burial: 3rd-2nd cent. B.C. (Jenkins) Contents: 191 AE. Pot hoard from necropolis Prado de las Monjas Ebusus: 103 (as Vives MH, pl. 12) 1 (as Vives, pl. 11, 12) Disposition: unknown Roman y Calvet, IPyth, p. 29, illus. (hoard said to be from "Marina de las Monjas")
